content.raw: I think the links should be `\ref services`, in the same way they’re created in the messages section \(search for “next tutorial” in [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/src/ign-transport8/tutorials/04\_messages.md](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/src/ign-transport8/tutorials/04_messages.md)\). Otherwise, the link will point to Bitbucket and as far as I understand we want to create an internal link in ignitionrobotics.org\).
content.html: I think the links should be \ref services, in the same way they’re created in the messages section (search for “next tutorial” in #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/src/ign-transport8/tutorials/04_messages.md). Otherwise, the link will point to Bitbucket and as far as I understand we want to create an internal link in ignitionrobotics.org).
